text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea kunstleri (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Red Balau) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea kunstleri". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33120A9758690. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33120A9758690.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
